aandukrama wyawastha prathisanskaranaya pilibanda mahajana adahas wimasime kamituwa ehi awasan warthawa pasugiya mayi masa 31 wenida agramathyawarayata bara dun athara ema warthawe 10 weni parichchedaya yatathe athi purawasiyange pulul deshapalana sahabhagithwayak pilibanda sandahan wana â€œgrama rajya/grama sabha/gamsabha sankalpayaâ€ yana kotasa mehi palawe.
meka patan gaththe 1951 di ewakata iranaye agamathi mosad .

dan balanna pahugiya dawaswala gowa wikunaganna ba.
